name: 5 Day Trial
description:
The game was created as an entry in The HEART-JAM themed "Scarcity", organised in March 2018.

It's a very short survival game about a guy being dropped off on an island for a (at least) five day survival trip, which he might not survive. 

Want to know what can you do with this guy on the island?

Defend yourself from wildlife:Decide to stay warm at night:Gather wood and be cool about it:

Controls:

WSAD - movement
Space (with direction) - dash
J - attack / shoot (ammo is scarce, be careful)
K - interaction (picking things up etc.)
U - setup a fireplace (so it's warm, it uses up wooden branches)
I - drop your weapon (so you can use bare fists)

Authors:
